name: Gourmet Cookalong
description:
Drawing inspiration from community dining and the pleasures of deep diving
into the art of cooking and dining well, this experience helps you engage all
five senses when you're in the kitchen. The caviar on the top is relishing a
wonderful meal that you, along with a bunch of people, will cook together.  
  
**_The theme of this cookalong is Neapolitan Pizza._**  

  * **The cookalong** : Learn to make and stretch the Pizza Dough, assemble the pizza with toppings, taste different cheeses and the house sauce. Learn how to use a wood fired oven to bake pizzas.
  * **The meal** : Virgin Mojito, the Pizza that you make, Dessert.

Note: The cookalong includes vegetarian and non-vegetarian meal options.

name: Hula Harmony
description:
A toy that was once designed for recreation, hula hooping gradually took the
world by a storm, starting with the United States in the late 1950s. Today
hula hooping is not just a playful activity, but also a form of exercise and
artistic expression. A cultural phenomenon, influencing music, fashion, and
dance.

**_This experience will involve a guided introduction to hula hooping, tricks
and transitions and flow choreography through some fun activities!_**

name: The Craft of Mixology
description:
Discover the world of cocktails and spirits and learn how to balance your own
cocktail concoction under the guidance of expert mixologists.

The experience will include a quick introduction to different spirits,
cocktail making techniques, bar equipment, interesting garnishing tips along
with various stories and myths around cocktails and spirits.

name: Echoes of Calm
description:
The use of sound for healing dates back thousands of years to various ancient
cultures. Indigenous peoples have long used drums, chanting, and other
instruments for ceremonial and therapeutic purposes. These practices were
often tied to spiritual rituals and were believed to have healing properties.

This immersive sound bath experience is built on the enduring belief in the
power of sound, and sets you on the path to healing, relaxation, and spiritual
growth.

name: Oasis Of Scents
description:
An ode to the masterful craft of perfume making and the country's best noses,
this experience will have you develop a discerning sense of smell, understand
the nuances of perfumery as a science and art, as well as how fragrances
passively contribute to our overall experiences to create a lasting memory.

_**The experience includes navigating through various fragrance notes to
formulate your own customised bottle of perfume, under the guidance of an
expert.**_

name: Spin City
description:
While the origin story of pole art is multifaceted, spanning across multiple
cultures and time periods, today pole dance is regarded as an art form
celebrated for its fusion of athleticism, grace, and creativity.

_**This experience is an immersion into the art of pole movement, looking
beyond its association with strip clubs to embracing it as a wonderful way to
move and stay fit.**_

name: Gourmet Cookalong
description:
Drawing inspiration from community dining and the pleasures of deep diving
into the art of cooking, this experience helps you engage all five senses when
you're in the kitchen.  
  
**_The theme for this cookalong is Asian cuisine - Dim Sum making._**

**Cookalong** : Learn to make and steam Dim sums from scratch, options
include; Pan fried chicken dim sum (non- veg) , Spicy Broccoli with cream
cheese dim sum (veg) ,  
Vegetables fried wonton (veg).

**Menu** : A welcome drink, the Dim Sums that you make along with a variety of
house made Dim sums and Chinese tea.

******Note:** The cookalong includes vegetarian and non-vegetarian option.

name: Treasures From The Estates
description:
Switch from coffee enthusiast to aficionado in this unique coffee appreciation
experience. Delve into the world of premium Indian Estate Coffees, and learn
the nuances of brewing and tasting single-origin brews, including a cold one.

This immersive experience helps you develop a keen sense of understanding
about unique Indian coffees and what makes them special. We will cover three
brewing methods - AeroPress, FrenchPress and Pour Over.

name: Polar Plunge
description:
Cold plunges have a rich history, dating back to ancient civilisations like
Egypt, Greece, and Rome, where it was revered for its healing properties.
Today, this practice is globally recognised for its numerous therapeutic and
wellness benefits.

A cold plunge, also known as an ice bath, involves immersing the body in cold
water, typically at temperatures between 5-7°C, for a brief period. It is
widely used by athletes and fitness enthusiasts to aid recovery and enhance
physical and mental health.

_**This immersive experience helps you take the plunge through a series of
activities, guided by an expert.**_

name: Summit Seekers
description:
Stemming from an age-old human desire to reach new heights, rock climbing is
beyond just a fitness ritual. This beginner-friendly rock climbing experience
draws inspiration from climbing pioneers, the unending human quest to problem-
solve better and design thinking to equip you with the skills and confidence
to embark on your own climbing journey. Join us and discover a sport steeped
in storytelling, where the upward journey is as beautiful as the summit.

name: Gourmet Cookalong
description:
Drawing inspiration from community dining and the pleasures of deep diving
into the art of cooking and dining well, this experience helps you engage all
five senses when you're in the kitchen.

**_The theme for this cookalong is Pasta-making._**

  * **The cookalong** : Learn to make Pasta dough, 1 stuffed pasta , 1 flat pasta (Fettuccine). Learn how to knead the pasta dough, rest, roll and sheet out the dough into shapes.
  * **The demonstration** : Pesto & Arabiatta sauce. 

Participants will take home the pasta that is rolled out, with instructions on
how to cook it at home; you’ll also be sampling two pasta dishes which are
made at Toast & Tonic.

name: Glass Gardens
description:
Imagine our world, shrunk to fit inside a bottle. In 19th century England, a
chance encounter with a tenacious fern sparked an idea, that of a terrarium.
Today, these self-sustaining havens encapsulate a tiny piece of the great
outdoors, indoors, and are a testament to human ingenuity and nature's
resilience.

_**This immersive experience delves into the world of terrariums and plant
care. Participants get to make and take home their own terrarium.**_

_**Note: Participants will create a Self-Sustaining Nature Terrarium in a Jar
with tropical plants.**_

name: The Dawn of Dough
description:
It all began thousands of years ago, when crushed grains mixed with water met
fire and the first flatbreads were born. In ancient Egypt, an accidental
fermentation led to fluffy loaves, turning bread into a staple of
civilization. From India’s tandoor to Greek clay ovens, baking soon became an
art form.

By the Middle Ages, bread fed both the masses and the elite, with hearty
loaves for everyday people and soft, rich breads for royal feasts. The
Industrial Revolution brought machines, transforming bread into a global
phenomenon.Today, bread is more than a food - it's culture on a plate. From
tangy sourdough to chewy naan and crusty baguette, every bite tells a story of
evolution, resilience, and creativity.

_**Step into the world of breads and learn the art of making piadina
sandwiches and hand-rolled bagels while exploring their rich histories.
Immerse yourself in the cultural journey of bread in this experience.**_
